text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Nature! Which do you like better: slightly 
sweet matcha raspberry soda or La France 
pear mayo flavored coffee?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, if I had to choose…… 
Wait, do those drinks exist!?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, in the vending machine in a corner 
of that vacant lot☆ Ah, or maybe you prefer 
the honey and Chinese cabbage flavor?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
No, no, definitely not it. You should toss out 
that adventurous spirit of yours right now. 
Away with it.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Just go for something harmless like carrot 
juice, ok? It's better to savour something 
in peace than trying out weird flavors and 
rushing to the restroom.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
But, but! Maybe today won't be like that☆ 
There's a chance to taste something new 
and marvelous!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
For example, I enjoy green peppers now, and 
I found them so bitter when I was young☆ 
Because as our bodies grow, our tastes 
can change along★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
It's the same for this juice! 
So you should try it once, becaaause…?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
No, no!? No way!! 
That has nothing to do with this! 
Phew, that was a close call……
